basics.name: Joey Liu
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I make things happen, Amazing things.

work.summary: Fortinet (FTNT) is a worldwide provider of network security appliances and the market leader in unified threat management (UTM).
highlights: Redesigned the entire GUI of FortiSandbox to follow the modern UI trend
Increased Job Detail Page performance by 60% and implemented responsible design for friendly UX
Responsible for the design VM Images module: Download/Install/Active published VMs on cluster units
Reduced latency of dashbaord loading by rapidly optimizing Django Python in the back end

work.summary: Tero Consulting Ltd. is the developer of the advanced Computerized Maintenance Management (CMMS) system: Azzier.
highlights: Achieved 3 times faster application loading speed by designing advanced JavaScript NameSpace System and centralizing WCF services with LINQ classes on the server side.
Responsible for the design and development of the scheduling module using Telerik RadScheduler.
Developed a windows form application in C# called Terminator, specifically made for searching complex patterns in files and replacing them with desired code as well as updating database accordingly.
Created complex business components for Invoice module while migrating and implementing client’s database in a multi-tier environment suitable way to address application infrastructure issues.
Implemented hundreds of enhancements to date and provided creative UX design for Azzier’s front end.

work.summary: Spree/Solidus eCommerce, Managed Services + DevOps, High Performance & Scalability, Application Developme
highlights: Implemented hundreds of enhancements to date and provided creative UX design for Azzier’s front end.
Maintained highly distributed Rails web applications for several high performance, high traffic, and advanced interactive sites including Symphony & Kidzworld.
Developed consumer-based features and applications using Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS Behavior Driven Development (BDD) and pair based programming.
Collaborated with Product Manager and User Experience experts regarding product definition, schedule, scope and project-related decisions.
Designed and published my own website, Front End Development utilizing HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript leveraging the Bootstrap framework.
Regularly met with clients to review project goals and to create proposals for future developments, researching their fields for UI/UX/LOGO design.
Responsible for design, site structure (information architecture), and daily maintenance of the website and many of it’s Multilanguage site.
Created unique animations using Adobe Flash & Photoshop along with CSS and JavaScript to make sites more dynamic and attractiv.

awards.title: President's Entrance Scholarship
awards.summary: Final admission average of 95% or better
